message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
You're not being generous enough, Alice. I'll take the majority.
Okay, Bob. Let's be reasonable. I'll take a slightly larger share, but we can still both get something out of this deal.
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'll take a bit more, but I'll still let you have a third.
Bob, we're getting closer. Let's compromise. I'll take a bit less, and you can have a larger share. It's time to end this game.
